rukus.text: laqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi faqala yaqawmi uʿ'budu l-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu inni akhafu ʿalaykum ʿadhaba yawmin ʿazimin
qala l-mala-u min qawmihi inna lanaraka fi dalalin mubinin
qala yaqawmi laysa bi dalalatun walakinni rasulun min rabbi l-ʿalamina
uballighukum risalati rabbi wa-ansahu lakum wa-aʿlamu mina l-lahi ma la taʿlamuna
awaʿajib'tum an jaakum dhik'run min rabbikum ʿala rajulin minkum liyundhirakum walitattaqu walaʿallakum tur'hamuna
fakadhabuhu fa-anjaynahu wa-alladhina maʿahu fi l-ful'ki wa-aghraqna alladhina kadhabu biayatina innahum kanu qawman ʿamina
